data.quote: As a rule I don't like suffering to no purpose. Suffering should be creative, should give birth to something good and lovely.
data.author: Chinua Achebe

data.quote: A man who pays respect to the great paves the way for his own greatness
data.author: Chinua Achebe

data.author: Chinua Achebe

data.quote: A man who pays respect to the great paves the way for his own greatness
data.author: Chinua Achebe

data.quote: If you don't like someone's story, write your own.
data.author: Chinua Achebe

data.quote: Wisdom is like a goatskin bag; every man carries his own.
data.author: Chinua Achebe

data.quote: There is a moral obligation, I think, not to ally oneself with power against the powerless.
data.author: Chinua Achebe

data.quote: Donâ€™t take shadows too seriously. Reality is your only safety. Continue to reject illusion.
data.author: Wole Soyinka

data.quote: The greatest threat to freedom is the absence of criticism.
data.author: Wole Soyinka
